page.description: A framework for a mobile application with a split-view Menu for navigating the app.

section.description: This template can be used to create a mobile application with a split-view menu. The menu is displayed on the left-hand side of the app - if enough space is available. The menu is collapsed and a button can be clicked to display the menu if there is not enough space to display the menu and the work area. The menu uses Font-Awesome CSS Icon fonts.
